#include<stdio.h>
int check(int,int);
int main()
{
    int x,y,i=0,f;
    do
    {
        if(i==0)
          scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
          i++;
          f=check(x,y);
          //printf("%d\n",f);
          if(f==0)
          printf("No carry operation.\n");
          else if(f==1)
          printf("%d carry operation.\n",f);
          else 
          printf("%d carry operations.\n",f);
          scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
    }
                                  while(x!=0&&y!=0);
return 0;
}
int check(int a,int b)
{
    int carry=0,p1,p2,sum=0,c1=0;
    while(a>0&&b>0)
    {
                   p1=a%10;
                   p2=b%10;
                   sum=carry+p1+p2;
                   if(sum>9)
                   c1++;
                   carry=(p1+p2)/10;
                   a/=10;
                   b/=10;
    }
    return c1;
}
